content: I have been stationed at Whiteman AFB for 6 1/2 years and have been declined 5 times for BOP. I have a C1 code thru medical which shouldn't effect me for PCS'ng or deploying. I can't seem to get out of this base for anything. My functional manager has been contacted and I have even contacted my CEM about it and, I am applying for MTL duty just to get out of here. Is there any advice anyone can give me?
reply: I have been stationed at Whiteman AFB for 6 1/2 years and have been declined 5 times for BOP. I have a C1 code thru medical which shouldn't effect me for PCS'ng or deploying. title: 6 1/2 YRS NO PCS
